data.text:
I tried to catch up, but I lost sight of her in no time. 
Can't expect to outpace an Umamusume. 
But I couldn't bring myself to abandon her.
data.processed:
<story>I tried to catch up, but I lost sight of her in no time. 
<story>Can't expect to outpace an Umamusume. 
<story>But I couldn't bring myself to abandon her.

data.text:
Her excitement turned against her, making her incredibly late, 
she messed up at practice, and despite her best intentions, the 
drinks and towels she offered were a complete failure...
data.processed:
<story>Her excitement turned against her, making her incredibly late, 
<story>she messed up at practice, and despite her best intentions, the 
<story>drinks and towels she offered were a complete failure...

data.text:
I was worried. 
I searched the area around the school for about half an hour――
data.processed:
<story>I was worried. 
<story>I searched the area around the school for about half an hour――

data.text: Huff, huff, huff, huff...!
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed: Huff, huff, huff, huff...!

data.text:
Next time... I'll run well... 
I'll be more helpful to Opera O-san...
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed:
<story>Next time... I'll run well... 
<story>I'll be more helpful to Opera O-san...

data.text:
I'll put on a good race at the meet... Then one day, I can also... 
...................! One more lap...!
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed:
<story>I'll put on a good race at the meet... Then one day, I can also... 
<story>...................! One more lap...!

data.text: Taaaaaahhhhhhh!
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed: Taaaaaahhhhhhh!

data.text:
She wiped off her puffy eyes, and started running along the 
riverbank with all her might――
data.processed:
<story>She wiped off her puffy eyes, and started running along the 
<story>riverbank with all her might――

data.text: (THUNK!)
data.processed: <story>(THUNK!)

data.text: Hweeehhhhhh!?
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed: Hweeehhhhhh!?

data.text: Falling right into the ditch.
data.processed: <story>Falling right into the ditch.

data.text: That was dangeroush... Thang you for shabing me... shniff...
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed: <story>That was dangeroush... Thang you for shabing me... shniff...

data.text: I'm okay... I'm used to it... Sigh...
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed: I'm okay... I'm used to it... Sigh...

data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed:
<story>........... 
<story>...........Why... why am I always...

data.text:
Her clothes were all dirty, and it was already so late. 
I assumed she'd want to call it for the night, and I was about to 
suggest that she head back to the dorm――
data.processed:
<story>Her clothes were all dirty, and it was already so late. 
<story>I assumed she'd want to call it for the night, and I was about to 
<story>suggest that she head back to the dorm――

data.text:
...I have to work harder...! 
Okay. I'm going off on a long-distance run...!
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed:
<story>...I have to work harder...! 
<story>Okay. I'm going off on a long-distance run...!

data.text: Ah, ah, s-s-sorry...! Am I... causing trouble for you...?
data.name: Meisho Doto

choices.text: I was thinking more that you're a hard worker.
choices.processed: <size=35>I was thinking more that you're a hard worker.</size>

data.processed: <story>Ah, ah, s-s-sorry...! Am I... causing trouble for you...?

data.text:
N-no...! I'm not a hard worker, that's not it, I really just, um, 
don't know when to give up.
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed:
<story>N-no...! I'm not a hard worker, that's not it, I really just, um, 
<story>don't know when to give up.

data.text:
Whenever I feel like giving up, I start to remember... 
And remembering always makes me drag my useless self back 
up...
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed:
<story>Whenever I feel like giving up, I start to remember... 
<story>And remembering always makes me drag my useless self back 
<story>up...

data.text: Huh...? Um, well... It's not really much to talk about, but――
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed: <story>Huh...? Um, well... It's not really much to talk about, but――

data.text:
This was back when I saw my first GI race... 
All those shining Umamusume, running such a shining race...
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed:
<story>This was back when I saw my first GI race... 
<story>All those shining Umamusume, running such a shining race...

data.text:
At first I thought a clumsy dope like me could never be part of 
their world... I felt like I was totally different from them... 
But the winner said――
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed:
<story>At first I thought a clumsy dope like me could never be part of 
<story>their world... I felt like I was totally different from them... 
<story>But the winner said――

data.text:
I used to think I couldn't do anything right. I didn't have any 
confidence in myself. But winning races helped me learn to love 
that self.
data.name: GI Umamusume
data.processed:
<story>I used to think I couldn't do anything right. I didn't have any 
<story>confidence in myself. But winning races helped me learn to love 
<story>that self.

data.text: And now, I especially love myself for running, and winning...!
data.name: GI Umamusume
data.processed: <story>And now, I especially love myself for running, and winning...!

data.text:
If I also work really, really hard... 
Maybe I can change, just like she did...
data.name: Little Doto
data.processed:
<story>If I also work really, really hard... 
<story>Maybe I can change, just like she did...

data.text:
So, I got caught up in the moment, took Tracen Academy's 
entrance exam... And managed to pass, haha...
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed:
<story>So, I got caught up in the moment, took Tracen Academy's 
<story>entrance exam... And managed to pass, haha...

data.text: ...I'm a klutz and bad at everything I do, but I just can't give up...
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed: <story>...I'm a klutz and bad at everything I do, but I just can't give up...

data.text:
I think, if I keep trying, one day I might be able to change like 
she did... I might even get to be as confident as Opera O-san.
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed:
<story>I think, if I keep trying, one day I might be able to change like 
<story>she did... I might even get to be as confident as Opera O-san.

data.text:
I can't stop thinking like this, and it keeps me from stopping... 
You already know I'm clumsy, and now I sound stupid, too, don't 
I...?
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed:
<story>I can't stop thinking like this, and it keeps me from stopping... 
<story>You already know I'm clumsy, and now I sound stupid, too, don't 
<story>I...?

data.text:
She was already negative to begin with, and it looked like that 
negativity was starting to spiral. But――
data.processed:
<story>She was already negative to begin with, and it looked like that 
<story>negativity was starting to spiral. But――

data.text:
The fact of the matter was, despite everything she'd been 
through, she was still putting in her best effort to prepare for the 
Race Meet.
data.processed:
<story>The fact of the matter was, despite everything she'd been 
<story>through, she was still putting in her best effort to prepare for the 
<story>Race Meet.

data.text:
Wh... A, a strength...? 
S-s-sorry, I must have misheard you, right...?
data.name: Meisho Doto

choices.text: Not knowing when to give up is your strength.
choices.processed: <size=36>Not knowing when to give up is your strength.</size>

choices.text: Not knowing when to give up is your strength.
choices.processed: <size=36>Not knowing when to give up is your strength.</size>

data.processed:
<story>Wh... A, a strength...? 
<story>S-s-sorry, I must have misheard you, right...?

data.text: I heard you right!?
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed: I heard you right!?

data.text:
Uh, d-d-d-do you really think so...? 
No, I really just- just don't know what to do with myself, really, 
that's all...
data.name: Meisho Doto

choices.text: It takes a lot to be as persistent as you.
choices.processed: <size=41>It takes a lot to be as persistent as you.</size>

data.processed:
<story>Uh, d-d-d-do you really think so...? 
<story>No, I really just- just don't know what to do with myself, really, 
<story>that's all...

data.text: It... does...?
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed: <story>It... does...?

data.text:
............. 
...Ehehe. I'm happy to hear that...
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed:
<story>............. 
<story>...Ehehe. I'm happy to hear that...

data.text:
――So, um, I'm going to, well... I really want to run some more 
before heading back...! Good night...!
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed:
<story>――So, um, I'm going to, well... I really want to run some more 
<story>before heading back...! Good night...!

data.text:
As I watched her run off, I could see in her, however faint, the 
traces of a strength that I'd never seen before.
data.processed:
<story>As I watched her run off, I could see in her, however faint, the 
<story>traces of a strength that I'd never seen before.

data.text: Huff... Huff....! ....Okay...!
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed: <story>Huff... Huff....! ....Okay...!

title: Sorry for not knowing when to give up
